name: A New Start
description:
NOTE: This is more of a demo (or proof of concept) since we ran out of time :(

Survive in a post apocalyptic world where you are forced to use 'ancient technology' to grow your settlement and protect yourself and other survivors. Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare #36.

How to Play

WASD to move

E to open inventory

Click on resources when near them to collect them

Click on an NPC waiting by your fire to invite them to join your town

Trade resources to NPCs in your town for better gear

Survive as many days as you can

Made By

TheTeaGuns (game design, art, animation)

LudumAnthony (game design, programming)

Things to mention since we ran out of time

Ignore bow slot & empty middle slot in inventory.

Food is worthless since we didn't have time for a working food system.

We may have taken on a bit too big of a project for our current skill levels, but we hope to be able to expand this into our full vision post jam!
